lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: Every single person has the ability to help someone else.  I am grateful to be a small part of this global network of lending.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.  I want to use my money prosperously and generously.  I am a small entreprenuer myself. and  I love this idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people fulfill their dreams.  I never give up on them and I believe that they can do anything!

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: As a mother I feel connected to other mothers everywhere, and want a better life for all of our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I study, teach and write poetry.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such a great idea!

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: giving people a chance to develop their business will make them a greater contributor to society.  Business owners demand effective government.  I view ineffective governemnt as the greatest obstacle for moving out of poverty in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest individuals savings into public companies.  I invest in companies that I believe will be successful.

lenders.name: Kaitlyn
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes I feel the difference I make in the world is limited. Knowing that I can help someone across the world achieve their dreams gives me hope that someone in the future will help me accomplish my dreams as well. Karma all the way, the world is a beautiful place.

lenders.name: hugo el clamor latinrock
lenders.loan_because: I need to produce and create a music,independed company records to produce many latin rock music,proyects here in colombia like shakira or juanes with my band el clamor,and others and sell millons copys and help much people around the world,and create concerts to preserve and care the earth. and bring to much jobs in concerts ,touring.and help fundations around the world with my music and proyects
lenders.occupational_info: create latin rock pop music,make productions,record music,make concerts touring  and help and cooperate with the music in festivals and campgnes ,foundations

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives.  Alone, I could not afford to make a difference, but together with other people, the impact is huge!  After traveling to some developing countries and seeing the poverty, I decided to find a way to help someone change their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach special education at a public high school.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: What is such a small amount in the US, can make such a huge difference elsewhere. I'm not rich by any stretch of the imagination so it certainly makes me feel good that I can help in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: When a government buys our software, I help them learn the best ways to use it. I also manage the people that train the client on how to use the software.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing and I can.

"I believe that, as long as there is plenty, poverty is evil." - RFK

lenders.name: Bevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of those who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: My work consists of providing the best care and opportunities for my family to succeed in life.  To me this is much more than education and financlal success but the success of being a whole person that lives outside of thier small personal world and encompasses all those in the world around them.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of anything better than helping someone achieve a dream and improve their lives and those lives around them. What an opportunity for me -  the small amount I can afford can have a meaningful affect on people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small nonprofit agency that provides rights protection and advocacy for quality of life and care to seniors, disabled persons and people with mental health needs.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Wonderful people around the world are working hard to change lives.  I support those who are in a position of educating others or providing pharmaceuticals in order to lower the world's population
lenders.occupational_info: Parent Education and Personal Growth Trainer

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that children get safely to and from school.  I'm a widower now raising 2 of my 4 grandchildren (ages 6 & 8).  It's challenging but very satisfying.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone with their goals as people have helped with mine.
lenders.occupational_info: To share the underwater world!

lenders.name: elizabeth nirbhebe
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense, It's one way to help, I like it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher and an alternative therapies practitioner/healer modalities include: Old Ways Healing, Reiki, Shiatsu, Tui Na, Sat Nam Rasayan, Taiji-5 Element Medical Qi Gong, Kundalini Yoga, Yoga for Youth and Yoga Plus, Early Childhood Special Education and Parent Education licensed, KRI Certified and AOBTA Certified.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing like the feeling of giving and knowing you're directly helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a Fitness Consultant and Personal Trainer in hopes to make a difference in the lives of others. Working on my M.S. degree specializing in low back pain biomechanics.

lenders.name: Wim
lenders.loan_because:
I like to give people the opportunity to get ahead of the game. Microfinancing works really well for this.
I especially like the Kiva model, because the loan amount goes directly to the borrower, with the least possible portion of the loan getting "lost" en route to the borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: I make maps.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in becoming strong, and independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychotherapist specializing in The Psychology of Women which focuses on the roles that we play, the transitions we make between these roles, and how they affect the way we think and feel about ourselves.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.occupational_info: I teach year 12 English, Literature, Psychology & History to students who are not in main-stream schooling.

lenders.name: Jo-Ann
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.  It only takes a small amount to make such a positive impact on someone's life.

lenders.name: jerry
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone and everyone, given the opportunity, can succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: I Am Rick
lenders.loan_because: I Can... Call it "Pay It Forward", or Positive Karma, but giving it good, it allows us to prosper in Peace & Love.
lenders.occupational_info: Transaction Coordinator, I put people and things together.

lenders.name: Marnie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone wants a better life for their children than they have themselves and opportunities  shouldn't be limited on the arbitrary basis of where a person is born.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with a disability to find ways to make it easier carry out their daily living activities and minimise the impact of their disability on their quality of life.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: to help people better themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer in the manufacturing industry.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to think that my humble loan is making a difference to someone across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair aircraft

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it is an easy way to help others with the same funds over and over.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance, and I think micro lending is a great way to create a positive change in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the installation of solar systems to help people get their energy from the sun.

lenders.name: melisma
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: tomohiko
lenders.occupational_info: business computer system engineer

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy feeling connected in a help-giving way to women around the globe.  At 61 loans and counting, I just might be making a difference!

lenders.name: Nilay
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: i help people with seizures (epilepsy) and other problems with their brain or nervous system.

lenders.name: Michael J. 2008edition
lenders.loan_because:
.
Humanity is a disgrace.  Our political systems squander wealth & opportunity.  Our spiritual doctrines lead us astray.  We educate our children to be blind.

The Kiva borrowers give me hope.  Because they're fighting back.  They don't accept that they're too small to be taken seriously; that women shouldn't succeed without masculine guidance; that school is only for the children of the privileged.

The Kiva entrepreneurs are creating change that is beyond the control of established socio-economic models.  My hope is that those changes they create will make us uncomfortable.

Its a gift to be part of this.
.
lenders.occupational_info:
I put words and pictures together.  Web sites, newspapers, book covers, magazines, posters, signs, slides, invitations,  business cards, food labels, logos, flyers, calendars, CD covers...

Its all graphics.  Go to museums, listen to your art teacher, take chances.  There's a lot to art.

lenders.name: Idell
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for our state agency that works to protect the environment.  I am now retired.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I hope to set a good example for my daughter by helping other mothers in need.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on their own feet.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to help build bridges from poverty to abundant life.

lenders.name: Jo Ann
lenders.loan_because: Too much of what we hear about the rest of our world are impersonal facts and figures.  This allows us to translate them into real people who share the same hopes we all have.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: victor
lenders.occupational_info: I OWN A FEW SALES COMPANIES

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on their own feet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am given a gift of management ability.  I try to build bridges for others to pass from poverty to dignity.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Theo
lenders.loan_because: I believe ordinary people, both lenders and borrowers, can still make an important difference in this world.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I am a strong believer in the concept that one man can make a difference. This is one way for me to make a small difference.

lenders.name: Jeroly
lenders.loan_because: I have some extra funds that I want to be put to good use
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to secondary school students

lenders.name: fabrizio
lenders.occupational_info: major national bank, it department

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because:
I like the concept of helping peole wo are actively working to make their lifes better themselves. This way they can follow their own idea of what they need. 
As it costs me almost nothing to lend, it is only the gesture that I gave them, the rest they achieve themselves and they are no "benfit-victims". I admire them working so hard at such diffucult conditions!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I need capital fund for demonstrating the art of earning in agriculture.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working for my community for the development of their living by working in the field of agriculture. I would like to make them practical knowledge by showing them how to cultivate a productive fruits and vegetables in their cultivate land.

lenders.name: The Girls
lenders.occupational_info: We are a very close group of girlfriends.  We have been friends for many many years.  We are very pleased to be able to make a contribution to the needs of our world.

lenders.name: Jo-Lyn & Christian
lenders.loan_because: We can only hope that we have each other to lean on when times are their lowest.  It is up to each of us to lend a hand to another.

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: Within our common world we should share & care. The way even poor people support entrepreneurs at kiva.org is simply amazing. Help the people to help theirselves.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: As I view and hear about the rampant destruction of human existence and the natural resources that should be available to everyone, I am disheartened and feel a little helpless in making a difference.  But, through Kiva we can help turn feelings of hopelessness into feelings of empowerment, destruction into a new genesis, and hate and distrust into bonds of friendship.  These feelings are not only for those who are being helped financially, but for us who can be of some small assistance to help our fellow men and women around the world (1 Timothy 6:17-19)

lenders.name: guy
lenders.loan_because: I can and I really believe in this model of charity.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a Regional Health Information Organization that  enables stakeholders to share patient health information electronically in order to reduce medical errors, improve patient care, and improve overall health.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I believe every dollar can make a difference. Someone once did this to help me get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients with all aspects of financial management and trustworthy advice.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe capital can change lives.

lenders.name: Steve, Casey & Naomi
lenders.loan_because: We want to teach our daughter the importance of giving back in life.  We want her to see that the smallest efforts can have big effects.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is a police officer, Casey is a stay at home mom and Naomi is a thriving 4 year old.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide advice to a government agency that helps people prepare for and recover from major emergencies, whether natural or man-made.

lenders.name: Alfredo
lenders.loan_because: I need to pay inmediate debts

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: We are our brothers keepers. Only when our world unites under the umbrella of compassion will the suffering of so many be eliminated.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and world cultures to 15-18 year old students.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much to give, so this way I can do more with what I have.

lenders.name: Niles and Janet
lenders.loan_because: We believe everyone can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Janet is a nurse that works with new moms and their babies.  Niles buys and sells older homes

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupation: MBA Candidate at George Washington University
lenders.loan_because: I believe.

lenders.name: Larry and Carla
lenders.loan_because: On August 29, 2005 we lost everything to Katrina and this is a wonderful venue to be able to give back, a helping hand up...not a hand out .

lenders.name: peter nyaga
lenders.loan_because:
we r one big family, & should assist where we can 2 make our planet better than we found it. 
its a blessing 2 give, than receive,

lenders.name: Boston women that Rock
lenders.loan_because: We decided to group together and loan to women who need help and that for so littlle we hope we can help support and change these womens life's in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of working women that realize how hard it is to raise familys and support a family. We have all been blessed and want to give back

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: KIVA loans are a great way to help make a dent in world-wide poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage computers and networks.

lenders.name: konstantinos
lenders.loan_because: just because...
lenders.occupational_info: I work on wastewater treatment and environmental projects

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way I can help out someone who's trying to make it in a difficult part of the world.  I especially like to help out those entrepreneurs who are farming.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small insurance agency in Colorado.  We help businesses and individuals with their health insurance needs.

lenders.name: CCTPA
lenders.loan_because: The preponderance of evidence seems to support the idea that microfinance is an efficient means of alleviating poverty and providing much-needed opportunities for entrepreneurs in developing economies.
lenders.occupational_info: The Canadian Center for Technology and Public Accountability (CCTPA) is an organization whose aim is to serve as a clearinghouse for information and resources regarding the use of existing and emergent technologies in the service of public accountability. The CCTPA is a Montreal-based non-profit organization established in 2009.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I want to do more
lenders.occupational_info: Numbers, Number and more numbers.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in that I was born into a loving family with wonderful opportunities for me to succeed.  I think that it is right to give some of my good fortune toward helping those that need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I love technology and programming.  I try to learn all I can about computers and ways of furthering knowledge and innovation.

lenders.name: Massood
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Canadian lawyer [specializing in Immigration Law]

lenders.name: Rick & Soosie
lenders.loan_because: A little here is a lot there.  Bang for your buck!

lenders.name: Riitta
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves. I also appreciate the possibility to see where the money goes and how it will help individuals. I choose businesses run by women, because I believe that through women I can also help the future generations.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: Iimplementar an office to work on General Service
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is dedicated to providing services in general, whether in computer work as for various businesses and homes. 
I dedicate this work as joy of technical knowledge in general, whether in computer, electronic, mechanical, engineering. Etc.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: capitalist with a conscience.  "teach a man to fish..."
lenders.occupational_info: wealth management/advisory services for a global private banking and asset management firm

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I deeply believe that we all have a responsibility to care for our neighbors, and in a shrinking world, our neighbors span the globe.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I love the creative process behind starting and running a business and I love that I can help someone else get started.

lenders.name: antoinette
lenders.loan_because: i really like to support women who want to create income for their children and their community

lenders.name: diane
lenders.loan_because: i want to make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I take decisions!

lenders.name: Edwin
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping at a personal level and knowing exactly what good the money  accomplishes.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain computer systems.

lenders.name: Venkatesh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the saying..."Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach/Help him to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lenders.name: Blen
lenders.loan_because: I am an Ethiopian and can appreciate how a little bit of help can go a long way.  I'm also a fervent entrepreneur and enjoy encouraging it in others, especially in women.

lenders.name: MIsty
lenders.occupation: CEO/Executive Director of a non-profit organizatio
lenders.loan_because: How could I not?!  It's the right thing to do!  Everyone deserves the chance to make something of themselves!

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I have a comfortable life, perhaps I can make others a little more comfortable too.

lenders.name: Clare & Tim
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans provide an easy yet powerful tool to lend a hand to entrepreneurial individuals and families in developing countries. Kiva is an incredible resource that helps me to live one of my favorite mantra's: "I wake up every morning determined to both change the world and have one hell of a good time. Sometimes this makes planning the day a little difficult." - EB White
lenders.occupational_info: Non-profit executive

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share those blessings.

lenders.name: Anna C
lenders.loan_because: I care!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Geographer...researching health and urbanization in West Africa

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I've needed help to reach my goals, and I want to help others reach theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people achieve their health and fitness goals in order to become the best versions of themselves.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people, not just once, but over and over again.  Hopefully this will really make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in the aerospace industry.

lenders.name: Danke8
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in breaking the poverty cycles.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the computer software industry.  Software has changed the modern world.

lenders.name: Gregor
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best instruments for the development of small business  in rural countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the owner and managing director of a private equity company, specialized in corporate finance for industries.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I love what I do. I want more people around the world to discover the joy  of owning their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: As a Mobile Notary, I offer Notary services and document preparation services in customers homes, offices, hospital rooms, nursing facility or any location convenient for the customer. I am available 24/7 by appointment for all notarial needs.

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: Helping others fulfill their dreams is a worthwhile venture. I understand the struggles of owning a business and it is a great feeling to be able to make even a small difference to others from all around the globe.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I feel like our current economic system has been created to function only  when some people are forced to do without- without a job, home, health care or even potable water- and as a consequence, without hope.  I can't live in that kind of World without trying to do something, however small, to make a difference. I admire these entrepreneurs who are taking the risk and working to better their lives, and the lives of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked formally in Airline IT.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I'm in need for a loan for 700.00. I am trying to open a childcare facility, but I don't have the funds. I have been working in childcare for 11 years and i'm ready to pursur my dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am very successful in what I do. I love children and I give them the best love and care.

lenders.name: Lee Ali
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate investor.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school every day in order to gain an education that will stick with me the rest of my life.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: It is the culmination of years of goodwill, unleashed by the power of KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: I bridge gaps in understanding... between people (via language) or within the business world (technical vs. business needs).

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: A helping hand up is so much more than just a handout

lenders.name: Sherry & Charlie
lenders.loan_because: We have traveled the world, and appreciate how lucky we are. Doing my part to help others less fortunate.

lenders.name: Ingoal
lenders.loan_because: I loan because although I don't have much, I still have a lot more than many people across the globe...so instead of spending it on some random stuff, I thought that it would be a good idea to give ppl a chance...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student of software engineering...

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is to struggle. I battle everyday with a sick husband. I want to make a difference and help someone in some way. I know what it is like to worry about the next meal, is the electric going to get turned off or will I have gas to get the kids to school. The chance to help someone in another country where the little I can spare would and could change someones life helps me to get through the day and realize my life could be much much worse!!! Ameicans and other countries have the spare change to change others lives.  They only need pennies a day to make a HUGE difference!!!!!!!!!!!! I especially want to help single mothers and women who have sick husbands or children or who have lost their husbands.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's an effective way to get money to people who can improve their lives and their communities.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I can, and those who can, should. I thank Matt, Premal, and everyone else at Kiva who have made it not only possible, but incredibly easy for one person to extend a helping hand to another regardless of the distance that may separate the two.

lenders.name: Wild Boar & Little Bird
lenders.loan_because: Heavenly Father has been so generous to me.

lenders.name: Kimber-n-Josh
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others near and far.

lenders.name: Mike & Peggy
lenders.loan_because: We love helping others around the world.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I have so much respect for those seeking the loans. I am humbled by the work ethic I see from Kiva participants.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the United States military.

lenders.name: Jan & Hans-Jurgen
lenders.loan_because: ...if not me then who?
lenders.occupational_info: "I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy." - Rabindranath Tagore

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for and the best way to show my gratitude is to share what I have with someone else.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because:
I believe this states it best...

"Gani paid off his loan recently. He and his wife feel very happy with the loan that changed their life to be better than before."

lenders.name: Dippus
lenders.loan_because: It's a nice thing to do. That is all.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: my brother gave me a gift certificate.  But it's a cool cause, so I am learning about it and enjoying helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a professional golf tournament that brings millions of dollars to the region and helps creates thousands of jobs.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to barely be able to meet the most basic needs of your family, and I believe in the power of people to act in positive ways to change their circumstances for the better. I am grateful to those who helped me to become successful in my own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a microscope to detect various cancerous and pre-cancerous diseases.

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in the entrepreuneurial skills of others.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: entrepeneur

lenders.name: Erin and Luis
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner I know the joy of building a business and I'm happy to help others in this process.

lenders.name: Fernando
lenders.loan_because: I trust this hand to hand net

lenders.name: sean
lenders.loan_because: It's great to be able to give someone a little 'push' to help them get going.
lenders.occupational_info: Always looking for the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I  hope that by helping individuals build their own businesses helping themselves, helping their families and maybe also local communities
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with depression and anxiety and other emotional problems

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the U.S. military.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Those that take a risk to get a better life deserve the chance to succeed.

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: it's my way to make a change.
lenders.occupational_info: I write learning materials for people who want to study English.

lenders.name: The Rash Family
lenders.loan_because: It makes us happy to help others succeed.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: Equipment operator in  Alaska mine.

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. And it makes me happy to see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor, former editor for the British Medical Journal in London, and am now back in the US, looking to return to clinical work. I am an American and avidly interested in helping others get on their feet, emotionally and financially. I am an entrepreneur myself, and love seeing people working hard to better their lives as I try to do this myself.

lenders.name: Cara & Kira
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who want to create a good life for them and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for 'Doctors Without Borders' (NGO) in the Public Health Department from where we support worldwide medical emergency programs.

lenders.name: Reese Cup
lenders.loan_because: I like to see someone smile even for a second. Its worth having friends and business partners across the globe, helping one another, receiving tremendous blessings from such relationships.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a consultant for private individuals who are seeking private funding for their projects.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: My real work is to help the world be a better place.  What I do during the day makes it so I can help others.

lenders.name: John and Sue
lenders.loan_because: Since we have been so blessed, we must share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired so we spend a good deal of our time using our talents for the good of others.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I've lived and worked in developing nations of Asia and Africa for over 30 years and I well know the value of micro-financing.  Kiva has impressed me as a unique and innovative way of taping into the huge population of interested and concern people in the 'Developed' countries of the world and linking them thru the internet with the aspirations and  goals of real people and real activities that promise to have a positive impact.  I'm looking forward to long and worthwhile relationship and involvement with KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: During my professional career I focused on designing, implementing, monitoring and assessing donor funded projects at all levels of society in the developing regions of the world.  I've retired now from my official role but wish to continue to stay involved in what I consider to be some of the most important work in the world today.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: All adults want to be independent, but they often need a little help to get there.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for 34 years.

lenders.name: LiewCF
lenders.loan_because: Helping people is the best way to make yourselves happy

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: golden rule
lenders.occupational_info: technical representative for a pacemaker company and work with doctors and patients.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: Kiva just seems like a good idea.

lenders.name: Sabina
lenders.loan_because: it's my responsibility to help out when I can with what I have.  The people that are profiled here have a cause and purpose that they believe in and I believe in it too and in them.  They're willing to work to achieve their objectives.  I want to be a part of their success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am student at McGill in Montreal, Canada.  I am currently completing an MBA.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to make a difference

lenders.name: Robert

lenders.occupational_info:
Early retired, early unretired cancer survivor, now back into tunnel construction; currently a fifteen km x 3m dia. sewer tunnel for York Region, Ontario, Canada; four EPB TBMs and loads of challenges;
Construction Manger, Southeast Collector Team, Hatch Mott MacDonald and Aecom, 110 Copper Creek Drive, Markham, Ontario, Canada

lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in a hi-tech company manufacturing and selling chips (semiconductors),

lenders.occupational_info: I help run a program that chemical manufacturers can choose to participate in. It will help them be environmentally responsible and provide safe jobs for their community.

1.  It makes me feel good.
2.  I want to help people help themselves.
3.  I think this is a great way to do something meaningful to improve the lives of other people.
lenders.occupational_info: My daytime job enables me to do what I truly enjoy in my spare time, which is to sing.  My fiance and I perform occasionally in local restaurants and coffeehouses.

lenders.name: Jason & Liisa
lenders.loan_because: I like to do my part to directly help people around the world improve their lives. I love being able to give money directly to individuals all around the world without bureaucracy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with and manage websites.

lenders.name: Fred F. Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I read about this program in President Clinton's book, "Giving", and this is the perfect opportunity for me to help the "least ones". When I help them, I help all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an open, transparent, and honest man. I am a citizen of planet earth.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: through Kiva you are able to see results at the personal level.  Donations made through other fronts keep things impersonal and distant.  With donations via Kiva you are impacting people's lives directly and immediately.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me happy!
My husband and I lost one of our 6 children to cancer 5 years ago and we received a lot of support so now it is time to give back a little.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I just started our own trucking business. We bought our own truck about 1 year ago. My husband does the truck driving and I do the paperwork and taxes and take care of our 5 children.

lenders.name: Guardiola Family

I love working with my students and it brings me so much joy to teach!  Jeremy and I love to serve God by working with people and showing them His love.  We have two wonderful children and we live on Long Island.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: These people are doing all the work to improve their lives.  All I have to do is contribute some small funds - which get reinvested indefinately.  Not every problem can be solved through economics - but for the many that can, I want to do what's most effective and Kiva is it.

lenders.occupational_info: I Drive a truck that has 18 wheels hauling consumer commodities from one business'es location to another for redistribution of the parcels.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: This is my birthday present this year from my husband. I have more than enough and can't think of a better gift than giving, to pay it forward.****** This was many years ago and many loans ago, the money keeps coming back and I can continue to re-lend and help more people xxx

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because:
Well, it's a bit of a cliché but:

"Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for life." 

We should all focus more on helping people to start their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Consultant - So my job is basicly to give other people advice about how to improve their business.

lenders.name: Dannie
lenders.loan_because:
I support Unicef and other organisations so they can do a good job for the very poor and not so strong people around the world. I do also believe that if we should have a chance to minimize poverty, and help the very poor people in this world it also has do be done through local entrepreneurs that have the energy and fighting instincts to try and build their own business.

If they can build a business that first of all helps them self to get a better life, and at the same time maybe in somes cases also can employ people, that will hopefully give a good and healthy energy in the local communitys where these entrepreneur lives.              

Education is also a very important part of the development of many countrys and communitys in the future.

lenders.occupational_info: I've worked for a few non-profits. I help raise money so that organizations can exist and help the community.

lenders.name: Kaisa
lenders.loan_because: Everything is fine in my life: I have  two lovely sons, a home, a regular job, food, water, peace... All that is a good reason  to help other women all over the world. I´m proud to be a member of  the team "Teachers for Change".

lenders.loan_because: it gives me pleasure.

lenders.name: Windsor Humanist Society
lenders.loan_because: As humanists we try to minimize the inequities of circumstance and ability - we support a more just distribution of nature's resources and the fruits of human effort so that as many as possible can enjoy a good life. Human challenges can best be addressed by human beings and not by reliance on supernatural entities or dogma.
lenders.occupational_info: We aim for the full development of every human being & affirm the dignity of those sharing this planet with us.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I have plenty to be thankful for and would like to help others who are not so fortunate.

lenders.occupational_info: I run a charity in the UK

lenders.name: cara
lenders.loan_because: I think this is truly a worthwhile program.  My parents had small businesses that helped put me through college. Someone took a chance on them at one point to get them started. There is truly something special and motivating about taking a risk to help someone that you've never even met as well. Don't we want we truly want a world where everyone is happy and successful at what they do? I think so...even if it means a small financial push to get someone going.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach primary age students. This is seven and eight year olds. I work in a public school.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the university of new mexico, I work part time, and I'm a midshipman in the US Navy

lenders.name: Trudy
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift and wanted to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired grandmother and know how hard it is to raise a family.

lenders.name: OHS Class of 2010
lenders.loan_because: We the students of Mr. Wood’s first hour US History class, would like to take our hard working money and donate it to less fortunate people.  As soon as Mr.Wood told us about KIVA we were ready to do whatever it took to help as many people as possible.  KIVA touched us as a class.  Instead of thinking about ourselves, we are trying to think of others. Instead of taking, we are giving.  The children of today are the leaders of tomorrow.  It feels so good to donate and to know that you are actually doing something to help others. We are standing up NOW and taking control.  KIVA is a wonderful site and is doing a wonderful job.
lenders.occupational_info: Students taking a stand in the real world.  We are people who care about others and want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me a great opportunity to help others who may not have the financial means but do have the aptitude and the ability to improve their situation through their hard work.

lenders.occupational_info: I work at a high school teaching math classes for students with learning difficulties.

lenders.name: Peggy en Paul

lenders.name: Melody

lenders.name: Marlies
lenders.loan_because: I have so much compared to most of the people in this world.

lenders.loan_because: This way I feel certain, that the whole amount goes to the stated purpose and not to administration in a NGO-organisation

Marian Wright Edelman
Lobbyist on Behalf of Children

lenders.loan_because: I was given a certificate to danate to KIVA as a birthday gift.  I donated to a woman who is making her business related to sewing, because I also sew

lenders.name: Yoc Lan
lenders.loan_because: Money makes money, that's a fact. I want to share mine, to help people and make their lives better. It's only a little step for me, but a huge step forward for the people who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm  a freelance television director.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he is fed for a day.  Teach a man to fish?  He already knows.  Give him a line and a hook, and he feeds his village for life.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a programmer for the big computers of the 60's, 70's and 80's.  Modern computers are different.  So I surrendered that career and am starting over agiain, learning to be an investment analyst.

lenders.occupational_info: I go to school full time, and plan to start at the University of Colorado in the fall of 2008

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in this organization. I want to help women in other areas of the world succeed and be able to support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company's Bangalore, India location grow.

lenders.name: Yoon
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: chialu
lenders.loan_because: i think it is a great idea to help someone in need and to help someone to create something that is sustainable for him/herself that is even better.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a freelance graphic designer. i design mostly branding and identity system for the corporate world.

lenders.name: Elizabeth & Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.  "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -Mohatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: Elizabeth works for a charitable health clinic for the medically underserved.  Michael works in machine manufacturing.

lenders.name: Arathi
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good! A selfish reason, perhaps, but an important one. Having been blessed with wonderful parents, great friends and good health, I want to help someone else out in my own small way.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I know it is right.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach adolescents with special needs.

lenders.name: Moses
lenders.loan_because: I can no longer accept that morality is something to commanded, or issued from tablets of stone. Rather, I have come to realize that empathy and mutual understanding are qualities that have grown and evolved in all of our hearts and minds, and that it is our responsibility to cultivate this part of ourselves to the best of our abilities. (In addition, I really feel quite terrible about what happened to the Midianites.)

lenders.name: PNAI shORe
lenders.loan_because: I am representing a group of people, PNAI shORe, who meet regularly for prayer meetings in the Jewish tradition. This year we decided to provide loans to small business people around the world.

lenders.name: Monika
lenders.loan_because: I'm an activist and want to do what I can to prevent the progression of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Mother-Baby RN at a non-profit hospital.

lenders.name: Loretta
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel as though I am doing something nice for someone else.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sustainable local economies.  I believe in providing food, services and products to ones own community.  I don't believe in a global economy, for one surely does not exist, nor should it.  The only true economy is Water Soil Seeds and Air!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in my heart.  I listen to my heart.  I know that the gifts of the Earth are not only for human consumption.  I work on many levels to raise awareness of the imperative task of re-learning how to survive with our human and non human neighbors!

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: We won't make it on this planet as a species if we don't help one another.  Honest, true help is the best there is...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a remodeling contractor.  I finish basements (lower underground levels) in homes and transform them into living spaces.  I wrote a book about it.
